entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning late in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount possibly reaching 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
